data.name: VISA Business
data.description: A low interest rate on purchases to help manage your business cash flow

features.additionalInfo: Up to 100 cards : Keep your business organised with up to 99 additional cardholders with individual card limits.

features.additionalValue: Complimentary insurance :  Get covered for the basics with complimentary insurance against unauthorised transactions.

features.additionalInfo: 55 interest free days : Up to 55 days interest free on purchases when you pay the closing balance by statement due date each month.
Easier expense reporting : Detailed statements help to monitor and manage your expenses with optional consolidated summaries by department and division.
Available for Businesses : Available for many business structures including sole traders, companies, incorporated associations, partnerships and trusts.
Competitive rates : Enjoy a low rate of 9.99% p.a. (variable) on purchases (new cards only) and 17.15% p.a. (variable) on cash advances.

We will send you and the Principal a monthly statement at the nominated mailing address (not always on the same day of each month) for the card account. However, we need not send a statement  under certain criteria. Please see T&C document for more details

Automatic Payment Plan : If the principal has an Automatic Payment Plan, we debit the payment specified on statement to the account selected for debiting under the Plan. We debit the payment 25 days after the statement date (or if that is not a banking day, then the next banking day).

eligibility.additionalValue: Intend to use the card predominantly for business expenditure
Should have business registered in Australia

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the Australian dollar value of any Foreign Transaction.

fees.name: Missed Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $0 applied for each late or missed payment

fees.name: Overlimit fee
fees.additionalInfo: $0 applied once per statement period if a transaction is made for an amount exceeding the available credit at the date the transaction is debited to your credit card account.

fees.name: Automatic payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: $0 applied once per statement period for each payment dishonoured made under the automatic payment plan.

fees.name: Statement Copy Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $2 for requests via Phone Banking or Internet Banking and $2 for all other requests

fees.name: Copy of a deposit or withdrawal form
